item.title: v0.0.5-alpha release notes
item.description: The v0.0.5-alpha release brings major changes to the MFS structure of uploaded files by introducing a new .ohm file type. Custom theme functionality has been added as well.

item.title: v0.0.4-alpha release notes
item.description: The v0.0.4-alpha release brings quality of life improvements as well as some minor bug fixes.

item.title: GUIDE: remote ohm node on a Raspberry Pi
item.description: This is a step by step guide for setting up a remote IPFS node on a Raspberry Pi running a headless version of the Raspberry Pi OS.

item.title: v0.0.3-alpha release notes
item.description: The v0.0.3-alpha release brings some minor bug fixes as well as some bigger updates.
